Welcome to Chudleigh

Welcome to our new website which has been designed to make finding the information you are looking for even easier, whether you are on a PC, tablet or mobile. To view copies of the Town Council Policies please use following link http://www.chudleigh-tc.gov.uk/council-business/policies. We welcome any comments you have or suggestions for improvement so please feel free to get in touch by calling 01626 853140 or emailing clerk@chudleigh-tc.gov.uk

News

The latest news and information for Chudleigh Town Council can be found here

Minutes & Meetings

Information on agenda's, meeting dates and minutes

Hiring the Halls

Information on room hire prices, terms and conditions and more

MUGA

Forestreet MUGA, terms and conditions of use, booking form, and hire charges

Playparks

Information on various playpark sites in Chudleigh, including how to access them

Allotments/Cemetery

We currently have two allotment sites in Chudleigh.

One on Tower Hill and one on Exeter Road

Town Hall Activities

Activities available in the Town Hall
